actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to suspend revenue sharing payments to States under the State and Local Assistance Act of 1972.

summary.text: Amends the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to suspend payment of the State government share of revenue sharing funds beginning in fiscal year 1980. Terminates the entitlement of the District of Columbia to the degree it is treated as a State without affecting its entitlement as a local governmental unit.

titles.title: A bill to suspend revenue sharing payments to States under the State and Local Assistance Act of 1972.
